Detailed Description

Simulation interface container class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The InterfaceContainer class acts as a container for all the inputs, outputs, states and parameters for the S-Function. An Interface can be `requested' via the addContinuousInterface() and addDiscreteInterface() member fuctions. Each Interface has its own unique set of IOs which can be accessed as public members of the Interface classes.
